revisions.rev:
The '''Saluki Radio Network''' are radio stations in [[Illinois]], [[Missouri]], and [[Kentucky]] that broadcast [[Southern Illinois Salukis]] athletic events. [http://www.learfieldsports.com Learfield Sports] is the syndicator.
== Current radio affiliates ==
{| class="wikitable" ! Station ! Frequency ! City ! Format ! Sports carried ! Notes |- | [[WVZA]] | 105.1 | [[Carbondale, Illinois|Carbondale, IL]] | [[Adult Contemporary]] | Football, basketball | |- | WRXX | 95.3 | [[Centralia, Illinois|Centralia, IL]] | [[Classic rock|Classic Rock]] | Football, basketball | |- | [[WEBQ-FM|WEBQ]] | 102.3 | [[Eldorado, Illinois|Eldorado, IL]] | [[Adult Contemporary]] | Football, basketball | |- | [[WRUL]] | 97.3 | [[Carmi, Illinois|Carmi, IL]] | [[Country music|Country]] | Football, basketball | |- | KYRX | 97.3 | [[Cape Girardeau, Missouri|Cape Girardeau, MO]] | [[Adult Contemporary]] | Football, basketball | |- | [[WMOK]] | 920 | [[Metropolis, Illinois|Metropolis, IL]] | [[Country music|Country]] | Football, basketball | |- | [[WHCO]] | 1230 | [[Sparta, Illinois|Sparta, IL]] | [[Country music|Country]] | Football, basketball | |- | [[WFMB (AM)|WFMB]] | 1450 | [[Springfield, Illinois|Springfield, IL]] | [[Sports talk|Sports]] | Football, basketball | Partial schedule |- | [[KATZ (AM)|KATZ]] | 1600 | [[St. Louis, Missouri|St. Louis, MO]] | [[Urban Gospel]] | Football, basketball | |- | WDDD | 810 | [[Johnston City, Illinois|Johnston City, IL]] | [[Sports talk|Sports]] | Women's basketball | |- |}
